channel.title: Deals on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Deals on TechnoStreet

item.title: There’s never been a better time to buy a Chromecast with Google TV
item.description: There’s never been a better time to buy a Chromecast with Google TV I will be the first to admit that Google’s latest Chromecast with Google TV had me completely bewildered when it was announced just over a month ago.

item.title: The Lenovo Duet 3 Chromebook tablet is on sale again
item.description: The Lenovo Duet 3 Chromebook tablet is on sale again Without a doubt, Lenovo’s OLED-toting Duet 5 Chromebook is the best ChromeOS tablet on the market but the smaller Duet 3 is still the more desirable device for those wanting something a little more portable.

item.title: The unlocked Pixel 6a drops to crazy-low price of $299 (33% off) in the wake of Pixel 7
item.description: The unlocked Pixel 6a drops to crazy-low price of $299 (33% off) in the wake of Pixel 7 As we move into the holiday buying season, deals are everywhere.

item.title: These Nest deals are poppin’
item.description: These Nest deals are poppin’ Google continues to expand further and further into the hardware space and rumor has it that some new audio devices could be on the horizon.
